thread.title: The Patriots are the top seed in the AFC playoffs
thread.title_full: The Patriots are the top seed in the AFC playoffs

author: Josh Alper
title: The Patriots are the top seed in the AFC playoffs
text:
Jan 1, 2017 4:00 PM 
And to think they only lost games at home this year. harrisonhits2 says: Jan 1, 2017 4:00 PM 
Fins played hard but they aren‚Äôt ready for the bigtime just yet. 
Steelers should have no trouble putting them away. edelmanfanclub says: Jan 1, 2017 4:00 PM 
So much for Bradys ‚Äúannual goose egg‚Äù in Miami. Patriots 8-0 on the road this year, not that it matters playoffs go through Foxboro!! mikeytoth says: Jan 1, 2017 4:01 PM 
Goodell must be livid. Jan 1, 2017 4:02 PM 
Fun facts of today‚Äôs game ‚Äì 
Brady surpassed Marino and now is 4th on the all time passing yard list, in Marino‚Äôs home stadium. 
Brady had the lowest INT-TD ratio ever in NFL history in the regular season, 28 TDs and 2 INTs. trainwrecksryan says: Jan 1, 2017 4:02 PM 
mauiraider says: Jan 1, 2017 12:04 PM Sounds like they are looking for excuses of What is sure to be loss to the Dolphins Who will run it all Day! 
Raiders win 
Happy New Year 

Happy New Year to you too! Not sure what‚Äôs gonna happen with the Raiders game, but at least we can point and laugh at your Dolphins prediction! Jan 1, 2017 4:03 PM 
Ladies and gentlemen, meet Michael Floyd. Jan 1, 2017 4:04 PM 
Wow! That looked even easier than I was expecting! 
And that was with the Dolphin‚Äôs good QB! 
35-14. That is about how good Miami is. 
One and done. 
How sweet was Floyd‚Äôs block on Lippett? 
What does Suh have in that head instead of a brain? Whatever it is‚Ä¶.he needs a bigger helmet for it. yankeemofo says: Jan 1, 2017 4:05 PM 
MVP. weepingjebus says: Jan 1, 2017 4:05 PM 
Few things give me joy like watching Jarvis Landry run his mouth while down multiple TDs. Happy New Year! LyinRogerMustGo says: Jan 1, 2017 4:05 PM 
Best team in football, period. It‚Äôs not that close either. 
All other opinions are trash. 
Sleep well Patriot Hater.üôÇ tigerlilac says: Jan 1, 2017 4:06 PM 
It is great watching the castoffs of other teams (Blount, Floyd, McClellin) stepping up and enjoying another team win. dontletfactsgetintheway says: Jan 1, 2017 4:06 PM 
I look forward to what excuse the children will make for why the Patriot‚Äôs keep on winning. Don‚Äôt forget, wait till the footballs are properly inflated and you will see how bad Brady really is?? Did anybody notice how the Patriot‚Äôs had headset trouble and it is never mentioned in the media? I forgot, the gatorade was warm for Miami so contact ESPN so they can make up another story on the Patriot‚Äôs! umassdebatingteam says: Jan 1, 2017 4:07 PM 
Taking out the trash. With Pittsburgh being half the team New England is, I expect the Phins to be a 10.5 point underdog. Jan 1, 2017 4:07 PM 
Let the hating begin! grogansheroes says: Jan 1, 2017 4:08 PM 
Well, I guess the Dolphins lost their Super Bowl. Maybe this will shut up Chippy. Probably not. YouCryin?PatsMustBeDoingTheirJob says: Jan 1, 2017 4:08 PM 
All is right with the world again. Thanks for laying down mimami. Stadium was half full and it was mostly Patriot fans. As it should be. Back to the kid‚Äôs table. Enjoy watching the Patriots cruise through the playoffs with home field advantage. It may take a little enjoyment out of your super bowl parties, so I advise to take the Patriots and the over. Have a SUPER 2017. michael228 says: Jan 1, 2017 4:10 PM 
Floyds block was savage. Helped but the game away. Glad to see the pats came ready to play and never took their foot off the gas. elmerbrownelmerbrown says: Jan 1, 2017 4:10 PM 
They have gotten the gift of playing in the worst division in football for the last 15 years ,,,two home games and in the bowl easiest road to the super bowl a team has ever had ! patriots123456 says: Jan 1, 2017 4:12 PM 
They are in a great position for the playoffs. 
Let‚Äôs see what they can do. Jan 1, 2017 4:13 PM 
elmerbrownelmerbrown says: Jan 1, 2017 4:10 PM They have gotten the gift of playing in the worst division in football for the last 15 years ,,,two home games and in the bowl easiest road to the super bowl a team has ever had !
